indications:
Indications relief of discomfort in mild urinary-tract
infections; alkalinisation of urine
name: POTASSIUM CITRATE
cautions:
Cautions cardiac disease; elderly; interactions: Appendix 1
(potassium salts)
side-effects: Side-effects hyperkalaemia on prolonged high dosage, mild diuresis
doses: 10 mL 3 times daily well diluted with water
